price: 7. Que tu parles à voix haute (ou non), Il Sait tous les secrets, et même ce qui est plus caché encore.
arabic: وَإِن تَجۡهَرۡ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخۡفَى

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tajhar bil-qawli fa-innahu yaʿlamu al-sira wa-akhfā
